participant_1.background:
My most valuable possession is my collection of fireworks.
I ate ice cream with my grandpa.
I always make time for a good anime before work, and I always pack a banana for my morning run.
i have been married eight years.
I enjoy working with my team and getting to help people.

participant_2.background:
I've been at sea for too long and miss my pets.
i am studying to be a special education teacher.
i am from georgia.
I am a person who loves the cold weather and enjoys living in rural Wisconsin.
i like to make clothes.

content.text: Hello! Hope you had a good day.
I did! I got to spend time with my pup. How about you?
I did too! I had an anime marathon with my grandpa. It was so much fun.
That sounds like a great time. I love anime. I'm currently watching one called "Bleach".
Me too! I love Bleach. It's one of my favorites.
What do you like most about it?
I like the characters and the story. It's really good.
Me too! I also like the action scenes. They're so cool.
I know right! I wish I was a Soul Reaper.
Me too! It would be so cool to have superpowers.
Do you want to watch Bleach together sometime?
Great! Let's exchange numbers and we can set up a time.
